sentences.en: Chinese restaurants provide a takeaway service.
sentences.cn: 中国餐馆提供外卖服务.

sentences.en: How Green Is Your Takeaway Container?
sentences.cn: 你的外卖容器怎么绿色?
咱们今晚吃一顿外卖的饭菜吧。

sentences.en: Married couples spend more time eating together, sit in front of the TV more and often order takeaway ready meals while exercising less.
sentences.cn: 调查发现，已婚夫妇一起吃饭、坐著看电视的时间增多，他们经常叫外卖，同时锻鍊次数减少。

sentences.en: Neither of us had much money so we decided to go halves on a takeaway pizza.
sentences.cn: 我们俩都不富裕,因此我们决定平摊买馅饼的费用.

sentences.en: Pizza was by far the most popular takeaway choice , accounting for 83 % of sales.
sentences.cn: 比萨的定购量占83%,是目前最受欢迎的外卖快餐.

sentences.en: Takeaway: We have become gifts to God that he delights in.
sentences.cn: 他爱我们,用自己的血使我们脱离罪恶. 我们也在他里面得了基业,这原是那位随己意行作万事的,照着他旨意所预定的.

sentences.en: There's a Chinese takeaway in the centre of town.
sentences.cn: 在市中心有一家中国菜的外卖餐馆.

sentences.en: We have a takeaway for supper.
sentences.cn: 我们晚餐吃的是外卖饭菜.

words.tran_cn: 外卖的，供顾客带出外吃的
外卖；（桥牌中）示意搭档改叫的叫牌

trans.tran_en: a meal that you buy at a shop or restaurant to eat at home
